reviews.review: ce tare !1!! doar ca acum am o problema,ma deconecteaza,o sa incerc s-o rezolv,in fine..e super jocul
I like this game, it's fun and makes allot of sence!

I love this game for it's mechanics and it's various maps, mercs, and options etcetc

The problems are usually, unbalanced teams, no way to  shuffle teams, and completely incompetent fucktards ruining said teams.

Most FPS games have shuffle team options when things get crazy unbalanced, and this isn't possible in TF2


WAYYYYY too many little kids, I'm worried for them tbh, this isn't really supposed to be for little grommets.  

Too many AFKS, no easy afk kick, takes freakin ages... if a vote even comes up no one votes. System is broken as heck with this aspect.

TLDR
Broken, kiddos, annoying, could be amazing.

I think tf2 is one of the best games I've ever played, the classes are vastly different, the different weaponds aren't strait up upgrades, but are situational, and change your playstyle. There are problems, though, competitive mode is a joke, the machmaking sysrem dosen't take skill level into account, and the tutorial is lacking (and stupid), but overall, TF2 is definitly a great game that is full of community and potential.

There is no doubt in my mind that this game is full with a lot of replaying ability and is a lot of fun. I have been playing this game for almost four years with 2100 hours (87 days) into it and I still love it. But lately, I feel like I have done everything I wanna do in it, so it feels like I am done with it. Most of my friends are rarely playing it anymore and completely given up the game for other games. So, game sux! I am just kidding. This game has a lot of character and a lot of thigns to do in it. One thing is for sure about it, it is one of my favorite games and it will always be in my favorite games list. It is one of the only games that I put so much time on. 8/10 Doesn't release anymore new weapons, only hats and reskins.

Team Fortress 2 is a game which very much embodies easy to learn, hard to master, leading many people to sink hundreds to thousands of hours to master one or one of the nine classes. 

This game is also hidden behind the game of dress-up that goes on. Personally I do not wear hats, however Valve was one of the first companies to come up with cosmetic micro-transactions, leading other companies, such as blizzard, to perfect the idea. 

This game is primarily a casual game, however there are many comunities such TF2 Centre, and UGC to bring this casual game into the competitive limelight many games strive to be in these days. The few developers of TF2 seem to want the game to go in this direction as well. 

Some downsides of this game is the slow update times, due to valve having weird company ethics, strange weapon rebalances when updates hitting, and encoutering script kiddies or "hackers" every 10-20 matches.

Dispite this game's many flaws it seems to be a timeless classic that no matter what game I play I always seem to come back to, leading me to have over 1,000  hours in this game over 5 years.

The best part of this game is the fact that is FREE TO PLAY meaning you can play with your friends, even if they can't get money on steam, something that cannot be said for Counter-Strike: Global Offensive.
Very fun game! If you like fun, fast-paced games, then this is perfect! I highly recommend this game to all!
